descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Pistons center Andre Drummond throws down a monster alley-oop from guard Reggie Jackson's no look feed in the first quarter against the Knicks.
videos.headline: Drummond finishes alley-oop from Jackson's no-look feed

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Drummond finishes alley-oop from Jackson’s no-look feed) 2016/02/04 ESHEET
